title.value: Исследование интенсивности изнашивания нового состава износо-коррозионностойкого металлопокрытия для трибоповерхностей деталей машин
Evaluation of wear-out intensity of a new composition of corrosion-resistant metal coating for tribo-surface of machine elements
Evaluation of wear-out intensity of a new composition of corrosion-resistant metal coating for tribo-surface of machine elements

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Krivitskij, A.V., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: During operation of machine units their assemblies and mechanisms are exposed to both external and internal factors resulting in the wear-out of superficial layers of equipment parts. This process leads to a deterioration in the functional parameters of the machines and tends to regulate their resource. Improving of the efficiency of technologies of technical service of home-made and import vehicles along with reducing of their operating costs can be achieved by restoration of the equipment parts with the help of special measures aimed on technical service, maintenance, running and storage of equipment. Intensity of the process of wear-out of new composite structure of corrosion-resistant metal coating for restoration of the worn out working surfaces of details of agricultural machinery is investigated. The results of the research have shown that application of the metal coating of the developed structure in regenerative manufacture of equipment's details essentially reduces intensity of the process of wear-out of working surfaces of details, increasing a resource of agricultural machinery and equipment.
